item.title: Lex add a quote by Eric D. Snider
item.description: "My attitude toward spiders is similar to my attitude toward ballerinas: I am in awe of your natural beauty and flawless instincts, but if you come in my house I will kill you." -- Eric D. Snider

item.title: Lex add a quote by Dan Pearce
item.description: "Once your past no longer has the power to define you, your future is, quite literally, yours for the taking. Every single beautiful thing you could possibly want or imagine will be yours." -- Dan Pearce

item.title: Lex add a quote by Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description: "The FUTURE of this world has long been DECLARED; the final outcome between GOOD and evil is already KNOWN. There is absolutely no question as to who WINS because the VICTORY has already been posted on the SCOREBOARD. The only really strange thing is all of this is that we are still down here on the FIELD trying to decide which TEAMâ€™S JERSEY we want to wear!" -- Jeffrey R. Holland
